title: How to stop websites from automatically expiring my session - Quora

response.answer_text: Websites you program or websites you visit? The first case. You can configure that kind of things if you read the documentation about the server you are using. In the second case is very subjective. There are sites that expire the sessions past some minutes (banks), weeks (i talk like whatsapp web) or months.. likely social(facebook, twitter).. maybe the option that is very close would be the “remember me” option before you log in the site you want to enter.. if the option is available.
